column4: Hi.  Recently I've had gedit lock up on me.  So, I kill it (with the x).  Then, I go to a terminal and gedit is still running (ps aux | grep gedit).  But, the process id is changing rapidly (it's starting over and over again).  "killall gedit" does nothing to help.  Any way to kill this thing, other than a reboot?
that doesn't do it.  It just starts again (new pid).
umm, i gots nothin' then.  good luck man.
